metadata.title: CVE-2023-3106 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability was found in netlink_dump. Thisissue can occur when the Netlink socket receives the message(sendmsg) forthe XFRM_MSG_GETSA, XFRM_MSG_GETPOLICY type message, and the DUMP flag isset and can cause a denial of service or possibly another unspecifiedimpact. Due to the nature of the flaw, privilege escalation cannot be fullyruled out, although it is unlikely.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3106` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-4.4.0-184-generic - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-184-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-184-lowlatency - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-184-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-184-generic - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-184-lowlatency - 4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1073-aws - 4.4.0-1073.77
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1023-azure - 4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-12.19').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-184.214~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1073.77').
linux-azure package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1023.24~14.04.1').
